#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
long long int gcd(long long int a, long long int b)
{
	if (b==0)
		return a;
	else
		return gcd(b,a%b);
}
int main()
{
  int t;
  long long int n,m,o1,o2,e1,e2,a,b,c;
  cin>>t;
  while(t!=0)
  {
      cin>>n>>m;
      o1= (n+1)/2;

      e1=n/2;
      o2= (m+1)/2;
      e2=m/2;

      a=o1*e2+e1*o2;
      b=(e1+o1)*(e2+o2);
      c=gcd(a,b);
      cout<<a/c<<"/"<<b/c<<endl;





      t--;
  }




}
